ProjectTitle: Fruit and vegetable cell wall material for texturizing food systems: potentials for dysphagia management
InitialFeedbackHistory: 15/04/2024 [REDACTED] will you use metadata for your data, eg generated by instruments or added by software, see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata [REDACTED] please focus in this section on how you will share research data underlying publications, peer reviewed journal publications are not in the scope of a DMP. [REDACTED] can consider using a repository such as RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing [REDACTED] note that considering OA opportunities is not sufficient for FWO funded research, make sure that you are aware of the FWO OA obligations: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/open-access-fwo
label: good with suggestions
